properties.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; Upper Weiser River
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:21PM MST until February 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...SNOW WILL IMPACT TRAVEL IN THE IDAHO MOUNTAINS THIS WEEKEND...

.A winter storm from the North Pacific will bring significant
snow to the Idaho mountains through Sunday morning.

* WHAT...Snow. In the Upper Weiser Basin, snow will mix with or
change to rain below 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations will be
up to 2 inches in the valleys and 2 to 5 inches in the
mountains. In the West Central Mountains, total accumulations
will be 3 to 6 inches below 5500 feet and 6 to 12 inches in the
mountains.

* WHERE...Upper Weiser River and West Central Mountains zones.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY
